Articles.Content:
I saw this topic being discussed in a post all the way back in 2013 and of course with the Modular Segmented SRBs mod. I'm thinking on developing a mod featuring all sorts of SRB parts, including these modular segments with engines. Now, I have much lower modding skill than linuxgurugamer and his advanced modular SRB system, so I got the idea (in the 2013 post) of making this simplified modular SRB system work like a liquid fuel stack, with the segments being caps and the motor nozzles acting as engines, with a custom resource (titled Solid Propellant or something), and replicating the characteristics of real SRBs (can't be stopped, thrust curve, blah blah blah).

 

What do you think? Could it work?

First!

It probably could
